alert.note: Alert for El Paso; Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued March 16 at 7:33AM MDT until March 16 at 8:30AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... South central El Paso County in east central Colorado... Northwestern Pueblo County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 830 AM MDT. * At 732 AM MDT, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Fountain to Pueblo Reservoir, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Intense bursts of heavy snow. Gusty winds leading to blowing snow and visibility rapidly falling to less than one-quarter mile. Wind gusts greater than 35 mph. SOURCE...Trained spotter. IMPACT...Travel will become difficult and potentially dangerous within minutes. Travel impacts are ongoing in Pueblo West. Locations impacted include... Northern Pueblo, Fountain, Pueblo West, Pinon and Hanover. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow Down! Rapid changes in visibility and road conditions are expected with this dangerous snow squall. Be alert for sudden whiteout conditions. SNOW SQUALL...OBSERVED
